description.en:
Collection of erotic GL one-shots.
Note: Each volume contains a *Yuri Hime Art Collection*.

**Volume 1:**
Cover: Monchi Kaori
1. "Suki Tokidoki Kiss" (好きときときキス) by Miyashita Kitsune
2. "Arcadia ~Flowers of Paradise~" (アークイヂィア〜楽園の花〜) by Mizuno Touko
3. "The Greenhouse Witch" (温室の魔女) by Mikuni Hajime
4. "Hao!" (好!) by Chi-Ran
5. "Girls' Union" (女の子会わせ) by Morishima Akiko (Also included in *[Onnanoko Awase](https://mangadex.org/manga/14473)*)
6. "From Your L-I-P-S" (くちびるにの・せ・て) by Jounouchi Nene
7. "Ichiban Sukina Hito" (いちばん すきなひと) by Izumiya Otoha
8. "Sweet Little Devil" by Nanzaki Iku (Also included in *[Sweet Little Devil](https://mangadex.org/title/9ea8f695-fbe0-4c27-a1ff-5af81b351d82/)*)
9. "BLUE" by Hayase Hashiba

**Volume 2:**
Cover: Mizuno Touko
1. "Onshitsu no Himitsu" (温室の秘密; "Greenhouse Secret") by Mikuni Hajime
2. "Girls Study" by Harumi Chihiro
3. "Tojitete ne, Kokoro" (閉じてて ね、 心; "Keep Your Heart Closed") by Rokuroichi (Also included in *[Kuchibiru ni Suketa Orange](https://mangadex.org/title/d8233114-a97d-4a85-8711-82c358a7cbc3/)*)
4. "Yurete Hazunde" (ゆれてはずんで; "Bounce and Sway") by Gyuunyuu Linda
5. "Heart and Soul" by Nanzaki Iku (Also included in *[Sweet Little Devil](https://mangadex.org/title/9ea8f695-fbe0-4c27-a1ff-5af81b351d82/)*)
6. "Love and SeX" (好 and SeX) by Chi-Ran
7. "Teacher's Pet" (先生のお気に入れ) by Jounouchi Nene
8. "Neko ni Naritai" (ねこになりたい; "I Want to Be a Cat") by Akiyoshi Nana

**Volume 3:**
Cover: Minami Haruka
1. "Sweet" by Ootsuki Miu
2. "Netemo Sametemo" (ねてもさめても; "Whether Sleeping or Awake") by Mikuni Hajime
3. "Closet Daisakusen" (クローゼット大作戦; "The Great Closet Operation") by Takahashi Itsumi
4. "Sweet♡Sweet♡Honey" by Hanada Maco
5. "Love Prep Room" (恋愛準備室) by Nanzaki Iku (Also included in *[Sweet Little Devil](https://mangadex.org/title/9ea8f695-fbe0-4c27-a1ff-5af81b351d82/)*)
6. "Sweet Exercise" by Amano Shuninta
7. "Otonato Kodomoto" (オトナとコドモと; "Otona to Kodomo to"), by Izumiya Otoha
8. "Time" by Hayase Hashiba
9. "Shoujo no Hyouhonshitsu" (少女の標本室; "Maiden Repository") by Yuzuha Seiro

**Volume 4:**
Cover: Nangoku Banana
1. "Atatamemasuka" (あたためますか; "Atatamemasu ka"; "Is That Warming You Up?") by Akiyama Koito
2. "Only a Secret From Her" (あのコだけに秘密のコト) by Inami Hajime
3. "My Girlfriend" (私の彼女) by Mikuni Hajime
4. "Seiya no Agape" (聖夜のアガペー; "Christmas Eve Agape") by Morishima Akiko (Also included in *[Onnanoko Awase](https://mangadex.org/manga/14473)*)
5. "Our Future Plans" (私たちのミライ計画) by Nanzaki Iku (Also included in *[Sweet Little Devil](https://mangadex.org/title/9ea8f695-fbe0-4c27-a1ff-5af81b351d82/)*)
6. "I Love You My Girl" (愛羅武勇マイガール) by Takahashi Itsumi
7. "Sugar Complex" (シュガーコンプレックス) by Aoki Mitsue (Also included in *[Princess Princess](https://mangadex.org/title/d569d8ab-75b0-4ceb-b308-b401cdb80835/)*)
8. "Hana no Shishuu, Mitsu no Hari" (花の刺繍、蜜の針; "Embroidered Flowers, Needles of Honey") by Yuzuha Seiro

**Volume 5:**
Cover: Zaou Taishi
1. "Love Potion" (ラブポーション) by Ootsuki Miu
2. "Amai Futari" (あまいふたり; "Sweet Girls") by Mikuni Hajime
3. "Osoroi" (おそろい; "Matching") by Yamada Toriko
4. "Doctor, Stop!" (ドクターストップ！) by Pierre Yamamoto
5. "Kore ga Koi nano ka Wakaranai" (これが恋なのかわからない; "I Don't Know If This Is Love") by Rokuroichi (Also included in *[Kuchibiru ni Suketa Orange](https://mangadex.org/title/d8233114-a97d-4a85-8711-82c358a7cbc3/)*)
6. "Koi no Iinari" (恋のいいなり; "Slave to Love") by Morishima Akiko (Also included in *[Onnanoko Awase](https://mangadex.org/manga/14473)*)
7. "Makka na Onna no Ko" (まっかなおんのこ; "Blushing Girl") by Gyuunyuu Linda
8. "Bed Made Matenai!" (ベッドまで待てない！) by Tanaka Rin
9. "Promise" by Akuta Rinko
10. "Your Love" (キミノアイ) by Momono Moto (Also included in *[True True](https://mangadex.org/manga/14867)*)
11. "Sweet Examination" by Amano Shuninta

**Volume 6:**
Cover: Shinba Rize
1. "Dream Story" (夢の話) by Rokuroichi
2. "Love the World" by Pierre Yamamoto
3. "Gravity" by Momono Moto (Also included in *[True True](https://mangadex.org/manga/14867)*)
4. "Houkago Berry Girl" (放課後ベリーガール; "After School Berry Girl") by Saida Nika
5. "Moment Like Fireworks" by Nanzaki Iku (Also included in *[Sweet Little Devil](https://mangadex.org/title/9ea8f695-fbe0-4c27-a1ff-5af81b351d82/)*)
6. "Bed de Muchuu♥" (べッドで夢中♥) by Tanaka Rin
7. "Honey Inferno" (ハニーインフェルノ) by Inami Hajime
8. "Natsu no Ojou-san-tachi" (夏のお嬢さんたち; "The Little Ladies of Summer") by Mikuni Hajime
9. "The Fragrant Sea Breeze" (海風が薫る) by Morishima Akiko (Also included in *[Onnanoko Awase](https://mangadex.org/manga/14473)*)
10. "Five-Second Love" (5秒の恋) by Yuzuha Seiro

**Volume 7:**
Cover: Rokuroichi
1. "Partners" (パートナー) by Saburouta
2. "Shishunki Medical" (思春期メディカル) by Kodama Naoko
3. "Unfaithful Woman" (ずるい女; "Zurui Onna") by Ootomo Megane
4. "At Dusk in My Room" (夕方、部屋の中) by Rokuroichi
5. "Ashita kara wa Mou Nomimasen" (明日からはもう飲みません; "From Tomorrow on No More Drinking") by Chisako (Also included in *[Dark Cherry to Shoujo A](https://mangadex.org/manga/23444)*)
6. "Yuuyami Mekakushi" (ユウヤミメカクシ; "Hidden in Dusk") by Momono Moto (Also included in *[True True](https://mangadex.org/manga/14867)*)
7. "flowblow" by Koruri
8. "ENCORE!!!" by Amano Shuninta
9. "Fever Retreat" (熱帯解所区) by Nanzaki Iku
10. "Summer Day" (夏の日) by Kurata Uso

**Volume 8:**
Cover: Saburouta
1. "Your Fault, Part 1" (きみのせい　前編) by Kuzushiro
2. "Your Fault, Part 2" (きみのせい　後編) by Kuzushiro
3. "stay green?" by Ohsawa Yayoi
4. "Cubic Starship" (キュービィクスターシップ) by Kodama Naoko
5. "Complex Marian" (コンプレックスメアリアン) by Aoto Hibiki
6. "milky" by Amano Shuninta
7. "Mousou Spiral" (妄想スパイラル) by Chisako
8. "My Little Red Riding Hood" by Kawai Rou
9. "Singing in the Rain" by Nanzaki Iku
10. "Love Sign" (ラブサイン) by Katakura Ako
description.ja:
女のコの為の、女の子×女の子のJUCY★LOVEアンソロジーコミック登場です!!

**第1巻の内容:**
カバーイラスト： 門地かおり
1. *好きときときキス*　漫画家: 宮下キツネ
2. *アークイヂィア 〜楽園の花〜*　漫画家: 水野透子
3. *温室の魔女*　漫画家: 三国ハヂメ
4. *好!*　漫画家: CHI-RAN
5. *女の子会わせ*　漫画家: 森島明子
6. *くちびるにの・せ・て*　漫画家: 城之内寧々
7. *いちばん すきなひと*　漫画家: 時津風おとは
8. *Sweet Little Devil*　漫画家: 南崎いく
9. *BLUE*　漫画家: 速瀬羽柴

**第2巻の内容:**
カバーイラスト：水野透子
1. 温室の秘密　漫画家: 三国ハヂメ

**第3巻の内容:**

**第4巻の内容:**

**第5巻の内容:**
